description:
With versatility at its core, the classic norrøna warm2 halfzip is a timeless fleece offering warmth and comfort on any adventure.

Made from high- quality recycled polyester and with a classic design, this premium fleece will slide into any outfit choice, regardless of your activity. It offers great comfort, quick-drying properties and good insulation combined with great breathability. It has a piped neckline running along the zipper for a clean look and finish.

The spacious kangaroo pocket, hand warming pockets and a chest pocket give room for small essentials. Other features include a high collar which provides extra comfort and protection and soft, elastic cuffs with thumb holes.
name: Norrona Norrona Warm2 Half Zip - Unisex
